section_title: Assessment of the Special Climate Change Fund
sentences: This matter was first considered in SBI plenary on 8 December and the SBI adopted conclusions on 12 December.
SBI 30 invited parties to submit to the Secretariat their views and recommendations on the status of implementation of financing of activities in priority areas defined in decision 1/CP.12.
The Secretariat informed parties that views on the matter had not been received from parties.
